Headline: #29 State Temporary Southbound Reroute near State/45th
ShortDescription: SB 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, 45th, Wabash, 47th and State due to, street blockage near State/45th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, 45th, Wabash, 47th and State due to, street blockage near State/45th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
